ObjectClass.Name: Octo (Critical Damage)
ObjectClass.Description:
Watch out!
This Octo has been fatally damaged
It will explode within 8 s

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 25 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Steals shields [+3 hp/s] \4X damage when frenzied \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 30 (+90), R 1, SR 3, Sta C

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Resource Processor
Objective.Details: - place near resource bins\Assimilates resources: Power and Q-Plasma\Can bootstrap and convert Q-P into L-C\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Morph: Dome
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Adv Buildings upgrade

Objective.Name: Morph: Dome
Objective.Details: \Robust defensive weapon emplacement\Devastating versus aircraft and light units\Detects cloaked units in a wide radius\Can move itself, Morph into Beam Dome

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires the Chronoporting\ upgrade at the REAPH

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
